rules.description: Browsers cmd+d -> cmd+l | open location
Finder ctrl+d -> cmd+backspace | delete
Finder f2 -> return | enter
Finder ctrl+x -> cmd+c & finder_cut=true
Finder ctrl+c -> cmd+c & finder_cut=false
Finder & finder_cut ctrl+v -> cmd+opt+v & finder_cut=false
ctrl left/right (shft) -> cmd left/right (shft) | move word
(not browsers, krita or vs code) home/end (shft) -> cmd+left/right (shft) | move start/end of paragraph/line
(not krita or vs code) ctrl+home/end (shft) -> cmd+up/down (shft) | move start/end of file
(not krita) cmd -> (ctrl+cmd+opt+shift)+m | open menu
opt -> cmd+space | open spotlight
opt+left/right/up -> (ctrl+cmd+opt+shift)+left/right/up | move left/right/maximize window (e.g. for Rectangle app)
opt+down -> cmd+m | minimize window
opt+b -> ctrl+F8 | focus status menus
context menu -> shft+f10 | context menu
right option (built-in keyboard) -> shft+f10 | context menu
print screen -> shft+ctrl+cmd+3
print screen+ctrl -> shft+cmd+3
print screen+opt -> shft+ctrl+cmd+4
print screen+ctrl+opt -> shft+cmd+4
(not krita or vs code) f3 (shft) -> cmd+g (shft) | find next/previous
(not krita or vs code) cmd+left/right -> cmd+[/] | back
(not krita or vs code) cmd+f4 -> cmd+q | quit
opt+m -> cmd+h opt-cmd+h delay cmd+m | minimize all
opt+t -> ctrl+f3 | focus dock
(not krita or vs code) ctrl+f4 -> cmd+w | close window/tab
(not krita or vs code) ctrl+page-down -> ctrl+tab | next tab
(not krita or vs code) ctrl+page-up -> shft+ctrl+tab | previous tab
(not krita or vs code) ctrl+enter (shift) -> cmd+enter (shift) | send
(not krita or vs code) ctrl+a (shift) -> cmd+a (shift) | select all (excludes Zoom)
(not krita or vs code) ctrl+b (shift) -> cmd+b (shift) | bold
(not krita or vs code) ctrl+c (shft) -> cmd+c (shft) | copy
(not krita or vs code) ctrl+d (shft) -> cmd+d (shft) | deselect
(not krita or vs code) ctrl+f (shft) -> cmd+f (shft) | find
(not krita or vs code) ctrl+i (shft) -> cmd+i (shft) | italic
(not krita or vs code) ctrl+n (shft) -> cmd+n (shft) | new
(not krita or vs code) ctrl+s (shft) -> cmd+s (shft) | open tab
(not krita or vs code) ctrl+t (shft) -> cmd+t (shft) | open tab
(not krita or vs code) ctrl+u (shft) -> cmd+u (shft) | underline
(not krita or vs code) ctrl+r (shft) -> cmd+r (shft) | reload
(not krita or vs code) ctrl+v (shft) -> cmd+v (shft) | paste  (excludes Zoom)
(not krita or vs code) ctrl+x (shft) -> cmd+x (shft) | cut
(not krita or vs code) ctrl+y -> shft+cmd+z | redo
(not krita or vs code) ctrl+z (shft) -> cmd+z (shft) | undo
f19 | restart talon
ctrl+mouse button 1 | cmd+mouse button 1 (does not work on apple trackpad)
